mdRecord.dcterms:title: Uncle Tom's cabin
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Greve Litho. Co. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A theatrical poster, featuring a portrait of Uncle Tom in a circle at top of sheet, and six scenes from the play: Eliza's escape; Legree whipping Uncle Tom; Slave market; Ophelia and Topsy; Uncle Tom and Eva; Plantation scene, with slaves doing the cake walk. Imprint appears at lower left. There is a blank space at the bottom of the sheet for the addition of information about local performances. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Robert and Virginia Tunstall Trust Fund, 2009/2010. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Stowe, Harriet Beecher, 1811-1896--Uncle Tom's cabin
